author:
Jackie Burrell

jburrell@bayareanewsgroup.com
title: Travel Top 10: Best street markets
text:
Travel Top 10: Best street markets By Jackie Burrell Posted: 10/07/2015 03:00:00 PM PDT Updated: 10/08/2015 03:08:09 PM PDT La Boqueria in Barcelona (Jackie Burrell/Bay Area News Group) Marvelous markets Museums are breathtaking and monuments grand, but adventuresome travelers know there's nothing like a bustling street market for real cultural immersion. So the folks at Pinterest.com sifted through their users' millions of travel boards and came up with a list of the planet's top 10 street markets, from Barcelona's glorious La Boqueria to Marrakech's medina. Go. Shop. Get lost. 
La Boqueria, Barcelona, Spain (pictured) 
Portland farmers market, Oregon 
Shilin Night Market, Taipei, Taiwan 
St. Lawrence Market, Toronto
